text:
Hmmmm, uuuhhh, orange flavour! Hello boys
and girls. Hi. I am eating sweets. They´re

delicious! This one tastes like oranges. It´s
magic!

Hi Steve!
Hello Maggie. Hi.

Hi.
Hey, Maggie, try one of these sweets. They´re

magic. This one tastes like… hmmm…. Apple!
Wow!

Hey, that´s not magic. This is magic! Abracadabra!
Hey, look, look! Hey, wow! Look, what is it?

Yeah! It´s an apple.
Apple!

Delicious! Hehey. Hey, come on, say with me
– It´s an apple. While you pat your tummies.

Come on! So what is it? It´s an apple. And
again.

It´s an apple.
What is it?

It´s an apple.
Yeah! I like apples, Maggie.

Ok, Steve, here you are.
Oh, for me? Thank you!

Yeah!
Look, a delicious apple. Yummy, yummy. Hmm

mmm delicious! Much nicer than those sweets.
Maggie that apple was delicious!

Yeah!
So hey, do it again! Do it again! Use your

magic, yeah!
Ok! Abracadabra!

Hahaha, look! Watch! Oh, wow! Oh, Maggie,
stop!

Steve and Maggie: Stop!
Look, what is it? Hmmm… I don´t know. Do

you know? What is it? A banana? Maybe. Let´s
find out. Ok Maggie, you can finish it.

Go!
Yeah, look! It´s a banana.

Yeah!
So tap your tummies and say with me. Come

on. What is it? It´s a banana. It´s a banana.
And again…

It´s a banana. Yeah!
Oh, Maggie, can I have the banana please?

Yeah! Here you are, Steve!
Thank you! Oh. Wow. A banana! For me!

Yeah!
Oh, delicious! Yum, yum, yum! Oh, I like bananas.

Wow. Oh. This is great. Hey. Oh. Hello boys
and girls. Hi. This is amazing. Hey. What

was that? Can you describe it? Oh look. It's
red and it's yellow and it's blue. Oh. What

is it? Yeah. It's a parrot. Hey. Say it like
a parrot. Oh. What is it? It's a parrot. Oh.

What is it? It's a parrot. And again. What
is it? It's a parrot.Yeah. Well done. Oh look.

More parrots. Hey. What are they? They are
parrots. How many parrots can you see? One,

two, three, four, oh no. Look, look. It's
a tree. Oh no. I'm going to crash. Help. Oh

no. Help. Oh dear.
Where am I? Oh hey. That was lucky. I'm on

top of a tree. Pfu. Hey. What was that? Can
you describe it? Oh. Look. It's a monkey.

A small happy monkey. Hey. Say it with me,
but very fast. When you see it. What is it?

It's a monkey. Haha. What is it? It's a monkey.
What is it? It's a monkey. Hey little monkey.

Stand up, stand up. Hey. Wow. More monkeys.
Hello. Oh. Hey. What's that noise? Oh no.

Ahhh.
Oh. That was lucky. Hey what's that? It's

big and it's yellow. What is it? It's a giraffe.
Hey. Let's pretend to be giraffes. Say it

like this. It's a giraffe. What is it? It's
a giraffe. And again. What is it? It's a giraffe.

Well done. I like giraffes. Oh no. Ahhh
Au. Oh dear. That was close. Oh help. Oh what

a crazy day. Oh. What's that over there? Look.
Oh. It's black and it's white. It's black

and white zebra. I like zebras. Hey say it
with me. But quickly like a zebra. What is

it? It's a zebra. What is it? It's a zebra.
What is it? It's a zebra. Yeah. Great. Oh.

Oh no. Listen. Oh not again.
Oh. Down at all last. Oh hey. Oh no. Look.

Something's there. What is it? Oh. It's big
and sleepy. It's a big sleepy hippo. Oh.

circus. Yeah! I like the clowns. Do you like
clowns? Yeah! Yeah. Great. Hey, Steve, look!

Hey, Maggie. Look, Maggie´s found a poster
for the circus. Yeah! Look at the clowns.

Wow! And hey, look. There is a tall clown.
This clown?

Yeah. Look, it´s a tall clown. Yeah!
So say it with me. It´s a tall clown. And

again. It´s a tall clown. One more time.
It´s a tall clown.

Yeah, great. But come on. Let´s go to the
circus.

Yeah! Oh, hey, let´s have some fun. Time
for some Maggie magic. Abracadabra!

Going to the circus. Hey, look at me! I am
a tall clown. Yeah! A tall clown.

That was lucky. Hey, what´s going on? Oh
look! Another poster for the circus. Let´s

go and have a look. Yeah!
Wow! Look at these clowns. Oh, look at this

clown. Yeah! This one? Yeah. Is it a tall
clown? No. It´s a short clown. So come on

say it with me. What is it? It´s a short
clown. That´s right. It´s a short clown.

And again. Come on. It's a short clown. Yeah,
well done. Yeah! But come on, let´s go to

the circus. We´re going to the circus.
Abracadabra!

Hey, look at me. I am a short clown. Yeah!
A short clown. That was crazy. Was I a short

clown…Yeah! …on a unicycle? Yeah!
Oh, it must be Maggie magic! Maggie, stop

being silly! I want to go to the circus. So
come on, let´s go. Ok. Going to the circus.

Oh, hey, look. Steve! Come back! Steve!
What Maggie? What is it?

Look, another poster.
Oh yeah, look! It´s another poster for the

circus. Yeah! And hey, look at this clown.
This clown! Yeah! Look, it´s a fat clown.

So say it with me. Come on. It´s a fat clown.
And again. It´s a fat clown. One more time.

It´s a fat clown.
Yeah! That´s right. But Maggie, I don´t

want to be a fat clown. OK?
Abracadabra!

Oh, Maggie, you´ve changed me into a big
fat clown. Yeah! Look, I am fat. Very fat.

Uh, cake! Oh, Maggie! Change me back, now!
Ok. That´s better. But Maggie, stop being

so naughty. Sorry. Because look, we´re here.
We´re at the circus! Yeah! Come on!
